metadata.title: CVE-2020-36327

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5

metadata.description: Bundler 1.16.0 through 2.2.9 and 2.2.11 through 2.2.16 sometimes chooses a dependency source based on the highest gem version number, which means that a rogue gem found at a public source may be chosen, even if the intended choice was a private gem that is a dependency of another private gem that is explicitly depended on by the application. NOTE: it is not correct to use CVE-2021-24105 for every "Dependency Confusion" issue in every product.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5 is installed
